item.title: About Me
item.description: Hi, my name is Furkan Ercevik, and I am a 2nd year Computer Science B.S. student at UCSC. I am currently taking CSE 101 (Data Structures and Algorithms) and CSE 120 (Computer Architecture). I am experienced in Golang, Python, C/C++, JAVA, Docker, CI/CD, HTML/CSS, gRPC, REST, AWS EC2, ECR, and CloudFormation. I have also worked with the Gorilla Mux and GORM frameworks in Golang, and Flask and Pycord in Python.
